about_the_game:
Welcome to the Midnight Market, the seedy underbelly of the city where danger lurks around every corner. In this game, you'll step into the shoes of a street-savvy hustler, buying and selling drugs to make a quick buck. But be warned - the market is cutthroat, and one wrong move can lead to a knife fight or a run-in with the law.

Navigate the winding alleys and shadowy corners of the city, keeping a keen eye out for potential threats and opportunities. You'll need to outsmart rival dealers, avoid nosy cops, and dodge ruthless muggers if you want to make it to the top.

With every deal you make, you'll climb the ranks of the Midnight Market, earning a reputation as a savvy and feared player. But success comes at a price, and the higher you climb, the more dangerous your enemies become.

Do you have what it takes to thrive in the cutthroat world of the Midnight Market? Or will you become just another casualty of the streets? The choice is yours, but remember - in this world, there are no second chances.

content_descriptors.notes: We do not condone the use or sell of illegal drugs.

In this game, you'll step into the shoes of a street-savvy hustler, buying and selling drugs to make a quick buck. Navigate the winding alleys and shadowy corners of the city, keeping a keen eye out for potential threats and opportunities. You'll need to outsmart rival dealers, avoid nosy cops, and dodge ruthless muggers if you want to make it to the top.

With every deal you make, you'll climb the ranks of the Midnight Market, earning a reputation as a savvy and feared player. But success comes at a price, and the higher you climb, the more dangerous your enemies become.

name: Midnight Market

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-4300 X4 / Intel Core i3-4130
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD AMD Radeon RX 560 / Geforce GTX 750 Ti - 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 240 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500 X / Intel Core i7-6700K
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: MD Radeon RX 5700 / GTX 1070 Ti - 8 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 240 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: None

dejus.descriptors:
Violência fantasiosa
Atos criminosos
Drogas ilícitas

short_description: Welcome to the seedy side of town, try to make money, while dodging knife fights, and running from the law.
